overview.quote: A caption should never conclude anything. It should create a question in the viewer's mind.
overview.introText: While captions may seem secondary to your video content, they serve as a crucial last chance to hook scrolling viewers. Learn how to craft captions that intrigue rather than inform, creating that final push viewers need to watch your content.

keyTerms.definition: Text that creates curiosity or FOMO as a last-resort hook before a viewer scrolls past your content.
A caption that answers questions rather than creating them - the number one mistake that reduces viewer retention.
Caption elements designed to spark comments, questions, or debate in your content's comment section.
Caption elements that showcase your human side, often through humor or self-awareness about your content.

actionPlan: Review your 3 most successful posts' captions
Draft question-generating captions for next week
Test a caption referencing later video moments
Add personality markers to your caption template
Track engagement on different caption approaches

mainContent.title: The Last Chance Hook
mainContent.text: Your caption serves as the final opportunity to capture viewer attention before they scroll away. Many viewers glance at captions as a decision point for whether to keep watching or move on.

summaryPoints: Captions are the final retention point
Many viewers check captions before deciding to watch
Secondary but still crucial to hooking viewers
Worth optimizing despite being less important than text hooks

mainContent.title: Create Questions, Not Answers
mainContent.text: Effective captions spark curiosity by hinting at content without revealing conclusions. Reference something intriguing that happens later in the video to create FOMO rather than summarizing your points.

summaryPoints: Never conclude or summarize in captions
Create curiosity gaps that need filling
Reference later video moments to create FOMO
Make viewers wonder what they'll miss

mainContent.title: Humanity & Humor
mainContent.text: Captions let you showcase personality beyond your video script. Use them to make jokes about your own content, add personal touches, or show self-awareness that connects with viewers on a human level.

mainContent.title: Spark Engagement
mainContent.text: Strategic captions can fuel comment section activity. Create mild controversy, pose thought-provoking questions, or hint at perspectives that make viewers want to share their own thoughts.

summaryPoints: Use captions to fuel comment activity
Hint at perspectives that invite response

proTips.text: For particularly important videos, test multiple caption variations on small audience segments before finalizing your choice.
Caption length affects visibility on different platforms - keep Instagram captions front-loaded as they truncate after 2 lines.

finalWords.description: Your caption should be the question that your video answers, not the answer itself.
